scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const redirectsPath=path.join(__dirname,'dist','_redirects');const publicRedirects=path.join(__dirname,'public','_redirects');const logData={location:'package.json:postbuild',message:'Post-build verification',data:{redirectsExists:fs.existsSync(redirectsPath),publicRedirectsExists:fs.existsSync(publicRedirects),redirectsContent:fs.existsSync(redirectsPath)?fs.readFileSync(redirectsPath,'utf8').trim():'missing'},timestamp:Date.now(),sessionId:'debug-session',runId:'netlify-deploy',hypothesisId:'C'};if(fs.existsSync(publicRedirects)&&!fs.existsSync(redirectsPath)){fs.copyFileSync(publicRedirects,redirectsPath);console.log('✅ Copied _redirects to dist');logData.data.copied=true;}else if(fs.existsSync(redirectsPath)){console.log('✅ _redirects already exists in dist');}else{console.log('⚠️ _redirects not found in public');}fetch('http://127.0.0.1:7243/ingest/d2e1f470-e0b5-41d5-9955-40cfee2f91d6',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(logData)}).catch(()=>{});"
